Perceptor:


"I will take something that belongs you... yours spark Canine" 
replied PErceptor while he avoided BlackFang's attack and strike 
back  with his gun


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> The wolf maximal was caught in the back, but recovered quickly. He 
> turned and faced the predacon.
> 
> Blackfang: I think you have something that belongs to me, vile one. 
I 
> will take it back!
> 
> He hurls himself forward, slashing twice with his halberd.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Perceptor::
> > 
> > "Me!!!!" replied Perceptor while he opened fire against 
BLackfang's 
> > Back
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Blackfang leaps, transforms in mid-air, takes hold of his 
halberd 
> > and 
> > > glares around furiously.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: Who's up for some scrap rattling?
